document.full_text: japanese stocks held steady on tuesday after early losses on signs of a slowdown in the u.s. economic recovery and oil fell for a second session as the dollar edged higher on euro debt concerns.
document.title: asia shares steady, firm dollar weighs on oil
lines_and_colors: japanese stocks held steady on tuesday after early losses on signs of a slowdown in the u.s. economic recovery and oil fell for a second session as the dollar edged higher on euro debt concerns.
